synthesis_conditions.external_stimuli: thermal treatment, light irradiation, hydrostatic pressure
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: positive charged FeII ions, negative charged [(Tp)FeIII(CN)3]@ units (Tp = hydrotris(pyrazolyl)borate), 4,4’-azopyridine (azp) ligands

pressure_GPa.effect_on_T1/2: T1/2 values increase upon applying pressure

synthesis_conditions.light_irradiation_effect: induces excited spin-state trapping, switches magnetic coupling pathways, results in metamagnetic behavior with significant increase of magnetization
synthesis_conditions.hydrostatic_pressure_effect: manipulates the spin transition process in a very sensitive way, showing a large changing rate of the spin transition temperature
